attributes.action: Support and push though Sir Christopher Kelly reforms on MP Expenses in full without any diluation by Sir Ian Kennedy who has has threatened to diulte the plans put forward by Sir Christopher Kelly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Ian Kennedy head of the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (Ipsa) has said today that he is under "no obligation" to accept all of the plans put forward by Sir Christopher Kelly on reforming MP expenses im angered by the response and think it is  "unacceptable" I would ask you to support this petition that if Sir Ian's plan is to to unravel the Kelly proposals must resign forthwith.
